participant_1.background:
I have no siblings, but I'm hoping to learn some new tricks to teach my dog so we can have more adventures together!
I went to my favorite art museum and bought a print of a comic book cover to celebrate.
i am a huge fan of classical jazz.
I remember my father leaving when I was young, and my mother working long hours to support us.
There are quite a few of us, but we all get along.

participant_2.background:
My most valued material possession is my collection of children's books.
I got to go on a road trip with my siblings to celebrate my birthday.
I was forced to use my badge on a friend to get information out of them.
I am a fourth child who was once lucky enough to swim with manta rays.
I am a ballet-loving mom of four daughters.

content.text: I love art museums, and comic book covers are my favorite! What was the name of the comic book cover you bought?
I got a print of the cover from a comic book that I loved as a kid. It's called "X-Men #1".
I've heard of that! It's a classic. I'm not really into comic books, but I know it's a big deal.
It's one of my favorite comic books. I'm glad I was able to get a print of the cover.
I'm sure it's beautiful. I love art, so I can appreciate a good comic book cover.
I'm glad you like it! I also have a collection of children's books. They're my most valued material possessions.
That's really sweet. I love children's books too. They're so imaginative and creative.
I agree! They're a great way to escape reality for a little while.
That's a tough question! I have so many favorites. I think I'd have to say "Where the Wild Things Are" by Maurice Sendak.
That's a great choice! I love that book too. It's so imaginative and unique.
It's one of the best children's books ever written, in my opinion.
I agree! I'm glad we have similar taste in children's books.
Me too! I think it's a sign that we're both good people.
